experiment_name: Directed Evolution of Artificial Metalloenzymes in Whole Cells
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:30 °C;    reaction_ph:6.0;    reaction_other_conditions:Whole-cell reaction (E. coli BL21(DE3) cells expressing Ir-CYP119), enzyme loading: OD600 ~50 cell suspension, reaction time: overnight, ethyl 2-diazopropanoate added in four batches over 4 hours, shaken at 250 rpm;    reaction_substrate_concentration:N-methylaniline: 10 mM, ethyl 2-diazopropanoate: 40 mM
